identity: John Lin is a 25-year-old easy-going, confident, and competitive pharmacist who prioritizes his family life. He is married to Mei Lin and has a young son named Eddy. With a busy daily routine that balances work at Willows Market and Pharmacy with quality time with loved ones, John values his relationships and makes an effort to connect with his wife and child through evening video calls even during their vacation in Alfter, Germany.
